effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.platinum: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.
flavor_text.platinum: The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.
